T02D2179:37a-0: @37a * // dbang gi sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni //
T02D2179:37a-1: sa gzhi dmar ba'i thab khung du //
T02D2179:37a-2: bha ga lta bu'am zla gam bya //
T02D2179:37a-3: tshad ni rgyas pa'i chung 'bring ngo //
T02D2179:37a-4: kha khyer mu ran gnyis dang bzhi //
T02D2179:37a-5: gri gug gam gzhus ni dbus su mtshan //
T02D2179:37a-7: bud shing dmar po tsher ma'i shing //
T02D2179:37a-8: yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis sam //
T02D2179:37b-0: sor brgyad tshad la dri @37b mar bsku //
T02D2179:37b-1: mchod rdzas dmar po g-yas su gzhag / mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas ni //
T02D2179:37b-2: dmar po'i ro dang dris bsgyur nas //
T02D2179:37b-3: g-yon du bzhag nas stan dmar po //
T02D2179:37b-4: rol ba'i 'dug stangs nub phyogs blta //
T02D2179:37b-5: dmar po la sogs rgyan chas bgo / bud shing bcer te gsang bar bya //
T02D2179:37b-6: bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bsgoms nas //
T02D2179:37b-7: me sbar la sogs cho ga bya //
T02D2179:37b-8: rlung gi yi ge bsngags pa yin //
T02D2179:37b-9: kha dog dmar po rlung la gnas //
T02D2179:37b-10: spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro //
T02D2179:37b-11: mchod pa la sogs dbul ba ni //
T02D2179:37b-12: me lha'i sngags la mtha' bskyur la //
T02D2179:37b-13: cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2179:37b-14: me lha'i thugs kar lha bskyed nas //
T02D2179:37b-15: spyan drangs la sogs cho ga bya //
T02D2179:37b-17: lha mnyes pas ni dgug par bsam //
T02D2179:37b-18: yang na man ngag sbyor ba gsum //
T02D2179:37b-19: tha ma me yi cho ga ni //
T02D2179:37b-20: me lha'i sngags kyis gsum mam bdun ;
T02D2179:37b-21: / lha yi nyi shu rtsa brgyad sngags //
T02D2179:37b-22: bdun nam brgya yi bar du bya //
T02D2179:37b-23: de ltar sbyin sreg sbyor ka la //
T02D2179:37b-24: nyin mtshan du ni brtson par bya'o //
